entry.title: $2500 // CHARMING SPACIOUS 2BR APT. IDEAL LAYOUT FOR ROOMMATES
entry.content:
Charming spacious apartment full of character, featuring two bedrooms (each room in a different side of the unit) with ample closet space. Spacious living-room with enough space for a big sofa and a dinning table.

Enjoy the convenience of washer/dryer room in the building !

A / C train line at Nostrand Av 0.15 miles, less then 5 minutes walk, you can be in the city in couple of stops! !!

The best part is the LOCATION in the heart of Bedstuy on a beautiful tree-line avenue. One of New York City's most vibrant neighborhoods, Bedstuy, Brooklyn is both sophisticated and urban known for its down-to-earth vibe. Ideal location next to the neighborhood bar/performance and chic coffee shops.

To schedule a viewing please text or call show contact info David

There is No Fee on the apartment.
Flexible move-in dates.
Guarantors Accepted.

**Pictures taken from a modal unit.
